name: MbPhis
typ: (List lbl -> Type) -> Neighbors lbl -> Type

name: MbTerm
typ: (List lbl -> Type) -> Neighbors lbl -> Type

name: CBlock
typ: (List l -> Type) -> Type -> (List l -> Type) -> l -> Neighbors l -> Neighbors l -> Type

name: MkBB
typ: Singleton lbl -> MbPhis phi ins -> List instr -> MbTerm terminator outs -> CBlock phi instr terminator lbl ins outs

name: .body
typ: CBlock phi instr terminator lbl ins outs -> List instr

name: .phis
typ: CBlock phi instr terminator lbl ins outs -> MbPhis phi ins

name: .term
typ: CBlock phi instr terminator lbl ins outs -> MbTerm terminator outs

name: .theLabel
typ: CBlock phi instr terminator lbl ins outs -> Singleton lbl

name: theLabel
typ: CBlock phi instr terminator lbl ins outs -> Singleton lbl

name: phis
typ: CBlock phi instr terminator lbl ins outs -> MbPhis phi ins

name: body
typ: CBlock phi instr terminator lbl ins outs -> List instr

name: term
typ: CBlock phi instr terminator lbl ins outs -> MbTerm terminator outs

name: emptyCBlock
typ: CBlock phi instr trm lbl Nothing Nothing
CBlock phi instr terminator lbl ins Nothing -> CBlock phi instr terminator lbl Nothing outs -> CBlock phi instr terminator lbl ins outs
CBlock phi instr trm lbl ins Nothing -> List instr -> CBlock phi instr trm lbl ins Nothing
CBlock phi instr trm lbl ins Nothing -> instr -> CBlock phi instr trm lbl ins Nothing
CBlock phi instr trm lbl ins Nothing -> trm outs -> CBlock phi instr trm lbl ins (Just outs)
List (phi inputs) -> CBlock phi instr trm lbl Nothing outs -> CBlock phi instr trm lbl (Just inputs) outs
phi inputs -> CBlock phi instr trm lbl Nothing outs -> CBlock phi instr trm lbl (Just inputs) outs
phi inputs -> CBlock phi instr trm lbl (Just inputs) outs -> CBlock phi instr trm lbl (Just inputs) outs
List (phi inputs) -> CBlock phi instr trm lbl (Just inputs) outs -> CBlock phi instr trm lbl (Just inputs) outs

name: emptyCFG
typ: CFG (CBlock phi instr terminatorrt) (Undefined lbl) (Undefined lbl)

name: Simplify
typ: Vertex a -> Vertex a

name: Unsimplify
typ: Vertex a -> Vertex a

name: simplify
typ: CFG vertex (Defined ins) (Defined outs) -> CFG (Simplify vertex) ins outs

name: unsimplify
typ: CFG vertex ins outs -> CFG (Unsimplify vertex) (Defined ins) (Defined outs)

name: Neighbors
typ: Type -> Type

name: Vertex
typ: Type -> Type

name: Edges
typ: Type -> Type

name: CFG
typ: Vertex a -> Edges a -> Edges a -> Type

name: Empty
typ: CFG vertex edges edges

name: SingleVertex
typ: vertex v vins vouts -> CFG vertex (vins ~~> v) (v ~>> vouts)

name: Cycle
typ: CFG vertex (ins ++ loopOuts) (loopIns ++ outs) -> CFG vertex loopIns loopOuts -> CFG vertex ins outs

name: Series
typ: CFG vertex ins edges -> CFG vertex edges outs -> CFG vertex ins outs

name: Parallel
typ: CFG vertex ins outs -> CFG vertex ins' outs' -> CFG vertex (ins ++ ins') (outs ++ outs')

name: IFlip
typ: CFG vertex (ins ++ ins') outs -> CFG vertex (ins' ++ ins) outs

name: OFlip
typ: CFG vertex ins (outs ++ outs') -> CFG vertex ins (outs' ++ outs)
CFG vertex ins outs -> CFG vertex ins' outs' -> CFG vertex (ins ++ ins') (outs ++ outs')
CFG vertex ins edges -> CFG vertex edges outs -> CFG vertex ins outs

name: prepend
typ: vertex v vins vouts -> CFG vertex (v ~>> vouts) gouts -> CFG vertex (vins ~~> v) gouts

name: append
typ: CFG vertex gins (vins ~~> v) -> vertex v vins vouts -> CFG vertex gins (v ~>> vouts)

name: lbranch
typ: CFG vertex ins (ls ++ rs) -> CFG vertex ls ls' -> CFG vertex ins (ls' ++ rs)

name: rbranch
typ: CFG vertex ins (ls ++ rs) -> CFG vertex rs rs' -> CFG vertex ins (ls ++ rs')

name: lmerge
typ: CFG vertex ls ls' -> CFG vertex (ls' ++ rs) outs -> CFG vertex (ls ++ rs) outs

name: rmerge
typ: CFG vertex rs rs' -> CFG vertex (ls ++ rs') outs -> CFG vertex (ls ++ rs) outs

name: initGraph
typ: vertex v ins outs -> CFG vertex (ins ~~> v) (v ~>> outs)

name: vmap
typ: (vertex v vins vouts -> vertex' v vins vouts) -> CFG vertex ins outs -> CFG vertex' ins outs

name: Neighbors
typ: Type -> Type

name: Vertex
typ: Type -> Type

name: Connectable
typ: Vertex a -> Type

name: cnct
typ: vertex v ins Nothing -> vertex v Nothing outs -> vertex v ins outs

name: Edges
typ: Type -> Type

name: Undefined
typ: a -> Edges a

name: Defined
typ: List (Edge a) -> Edges a

name: Closed
typ: Neighbors a

name: Single
typ: a -> Neighbors a

name: fromVOut
typ: a -> Neighbors a -> Edges a

name: fromVIn
typ: Neighbors a -> a -> Edges a
a -> Neighbors a -> Edges a
Neighbors a -> a -> Edges a

name: CFG
typ: Vertex a -> Edges a -> Edges a -> Type

name: Empty
typ: CFG vertex (Defined edges) (Defined edges)

name: SingleVertex
typ: vertex v vins vouts -> CFG vertex (vins ?~~> v) (v ~>>? vouts)

name: Cycle
typ: CFG vertex (Defined (ins ++ loopOuts)) (Defined (loopIns ++ outs)) -> CFG vertex (Defined loopIns) (Defined loopOuts) -> CFG vertex (Defined ins) (Defined outs)

name: Series
typ: CFG vertex ins (Defined edges) -> CFG vertex (Defined edges) outs -> CFG vertex ins outs

name: Parallel
typ: CFG vertex (Defined ins) (Defined outs) -> CFG vertex (Defined ins') (Defined outs') -> CFG vertex (Defined (ins ++ ins')) (Defined (outs ++ outs'))

name: IFlip
typ: CFG vertex (Defined (ins ++ ins')) outs -> CFG vertex (Defined (ins' ++ ins)) outs

name: OFlip
typ: CFG vertex ins (Defined (outs ++ outs')) -> CFG vertex ins (Defined (outs' ++ outs))
CFG vertex (Defined ins) (Defined outs) -> CFG vertex (Defined ins') (Defined outs') -> CFG vertex (Defined (ins ++ ins')) (Defined (outs ++ outs'))
CFG vertex ins (Defined edges) -> CFG vertex (Defined edges) outs -> CFG vertex ins outs

name: prepend
typ: vertex v vins (Just vouts) -> CFG vertex (Defined (v ~>> vouts)) gouts -> CFG vertex (vins ?~~> v) gouts

name: append
typ: CFG vertex gins (Defined (vins ~~> v)) -> vertex v (Just vins) vouts -> CFG vertex gins (v ~>>? vouts)

name: lbranch
typ: CFG vertex ins (Defined (ls ++ rs)) -> CFG vertex (Defined ls) (Defined ls') -> CFG vertex ins (Defined (ls' ++ rs))

name: rbranch
typ: CFG vertex ins (Defined (ls ++ rs)) -> CFG vertex (Defined rs) (Defined rs') -> CFG vertex ins (Defined (ls ++ rs'))

name: lmerge
typ: CFG vertex (Defined ls) (Defined ls') -> CFG vertex (Defined (ls' ++ rs)) outs -> CFG vertex (Defined (ls ++ rs)) outs

name: rmerge
typ: CFG vertex (Defined rs) (Defined rs') -> CFG vertex (Defined (ls ++ rs')) outs -> CFG vertex (Defined (ls ++ rs)) outs

name: imap
typ: (vertex v Nothing outs -> vertex v ins outs) -> CFG vertex (Undefined v) gouts -> CFG vertex (ins ?~~> v) gouts

name: omap
typ: (vertex v ins Nothing -> vertex v ins outs) -> CFG vertex gins (Undefined v) -> CFG vertex gins (v ~>>? outs)

name: connect
typ: Connectable vertex => CFG vertex ins (Undefined v) -> CFG vertex (Undefined v) outs -> CFG vertex ins outs
Connectable vertex => CFG vertex ins (Undefined v) -> CFG vertex (Undefined v) outs -> CFG vertex ins outs

name: initGraph
typ: vertex v Nothing Nothing -> CFG vertex (Undefined v) (Undefined v)

name: iget
typ: (vertex v Nothing outs -> b) -> CFG vertex (Undefined v) gouts -> b

name: oget
typ: (vertex v ins Nothing -> b) -> CFG vertex gins (Undefined v) -> b

name: vmap
typ: (vertex v vins vouts -> vertex' v vins vouts) -> CFG vertex ins outs -> CFG vertex' ins outs

name: vmap'
typ: (vertex v (Just vins) (Just vouts) -> vertex' v (Just vins) (Just vouts)) -> CFG vertex (Defined ins) (Defined outs) -> CFG vertex' (Defined ins) (Defined outs)

name: Edge
typ: Type -> Type
a -> a -> Edge a
a -> a -> Edge a

name: Dest
typ: Edge a -> a

name: Origin
typ: Edge a -> a
List a -> a -> List (Edge a)
a -> List a -> List (Edge a)
a -> List a -> List (Edge a)
List a -> a -> List (Edge a)

name: collect_concat
typ: (v : a) -> (vs : List a) -> (ws : List a) -> (vs ++ ws) ~~> v = (vs ~~> v) ++ (ws ~~> v)

name: distribute_concat
typ: (v : a) -> (vs : List a) -> (ws : List a) -> v ~>> (vs ++ ws) = (v ~>> vs) ++ (v ~>> ws)
